verbs.description: On the eve of a G7 summit in Canada that [V: could] be awkward for President Trump , Russian President Vladimir Putin took a dig at members of the bloc that has excluded him for the past four years , seemingly relishing spats over Trump ’s trade tariffs and other policies .
